title: Best of The Program | Guests: Sen. Mike Lee, Andrew Roth, & Bethany Mandel | 5/10/21
description:
While President Biden won’t condemn the protests at Supreme Court justices’ houses, Sen. Mike Lee joins to explain why they’re clearly illegal and “really creepy.” State Freedom Caucus Network president Andrew Roth joins to discuss the importance of organizing at the state level. ESG scores will soon affect states. Deseret News contributing writer Bethany Mandel joins to share the truth about the baby formula shortage.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
